title: OpenAI Reveals Over 1 Million ChatGPT Users Discuss Suicide Weekly
contentSnippet: OpenAI says it’s strengthening suicide crisis safeguards, but a former researcher says the fixes don’t go far enough.

title: Humanoid Race Heats Up as 1X Unveils Talking Home Robot Helper NEO
contentSnippet: Analysts expect the humanoid and service-robot markets to exceed $300 billion within the next decade as companies continue to forge ahead.

title: Australia’s Financial Regulator Flags Broader Oversight of Crypto Under Updated Guidance
contentSnippet: The final guidance expands last year’s draft, adding new examples and custody rules as ASIC shifts from proposals to enforceable oversight.

title: Visa adding support for four stablecoins on four unique blockchains, as spend quadrupled last quarter
contentSnippet: CEO Ryan McInerney also noted that his company has started enabling banks to mint and burn their own stablecoins.

title: Sam Altman Confronts Backlash Over GPT-5 Rollout, Unveils Expanding Vision During AMA
contentSnippet: The OpenAI CEO admitted the company mishandled the GPT-5 upgrade and said adults deserve freer tools.

title: AI Backlash Is Here: Even Sophisticated Users Are Getting Sick of Tech's Latest Obsession
contentSnippet: Forced AI software features are stirring real user frustration, while studies on fatigue are piling up. Is a full-blown revolt in our future?

title: Ethereum Set to Debut 'Key to Layer-2 Scaling' as Fusaka Upgrade Clears Final Test
contentSnippet: Ethereum's Fusaka upgrade, set for December 3, will introduce a long-anticipated system for making layer-2 transactions even cheaper and more efficient.

title: Ethereum’s Fusaka hard fork activates on final testnet ahead of mainnet launch
contentSnippet: Hoodi represents the third and final testnet deployment, following successive activations on Holesky and Sepolia earlier this month.

title: Bitcoin Miner TeraWulf's Stock Soars on Google-Backed AI Expansion Plans
contentSnippet: The publicly-traded miner said it was adding more AI computing power as part of its deal with Fluidstack. Other miners' share prices fell.

title: Mt. Gox Bitcoin Billions Are Being Repaid—How We Got Here
contentSnippet: More than a decade after the world’s largest Bitcoin exchange was hacked, Mt. Gox creditors are finally being repaid—with further delays.

title: SUI Slides 3.4% as $2.60 Support Snaps on 180% Volume Surge
contentSnippet: Volume spiked 180% over average as nearly 2.7M tokens traded in a single minute.

title: Tether Tokenized Gold Reserves Exceeded 11.6 Tons in Q3 Amid Yellow Metal's Rally
contentSnippet: Tether's gold-backed token swelled above $2 billion market cap, driven by record prices and surging retail demand, CEO Paolo Ardoino said in an interview.

title: Bitcoin Sinks Below $113K as Stocks Hit Records; Sell-Off Could Have Room to Run, Says Bitfinex
contentSnippet: Nvidia closed in on a $4 trillion market cap amid CEO Jensen Huang's keynote speech at a tech conference, seemingly sucking capital out of crypto on Tuesday afternoon.

title: New crypto ETFs tracking Litecoin, Hedera and Solana generate $65 million in day-one trading volume
contentSnippet: The first ETFs to track the spot price of Litecoin and HBAR made their debuts Tuesday, along with a new staked SOL fund.

title: Bitcoin Uptober Cliffhanger: Will BTC Close the Month Green?
contentSnippet: With just days left in Uptober, Bitcoin is in the green for the month—but just barely. Can it hold on and keep the seasonal trend alive?

title: Blockchain-Based Polymarket Eyes U.S. Comeback by November: BBG
contentSnippet: Polymarket previously announced it would launch a token and had acquired a CFTC-registered entity.

title: Hyperliquid and BNB Chain capture majority of L1 fees as Solana fades amid derivatives boom

title: Ethereum’s Fusaka Upgrade Completes Final Hoodi Test Ahead of Mainnet Launch
contentSnippet: With all three tests done, developers will finalize the date that Fusaka will go live on mainnet, tentatively aiming for December 3.

title: Microsoft AI Chief Says No to 'Sex Robots' as Industry Booms
contentSnippet: Microsoft's AI boss Mustafa Suleyman nixes erotic development, setting the tech giant apart from rivals exploring romantic chatbots.

title: SharpLink Plans $200M ETH Deployment on Consensys’ Linea Over Multiple Years
contentSnippet: SharpLink said it will use Anchorage Digital to deploy ether on Linea, combining ether.fi staking and EigenCloud restaking to seek yield under institutional controls.

title: Polymarket to go live in the US by late November as sports betting becomes key battleground: Bloomberg

title: Chainlink Underpins Balcony's $240B Real Estate Tokenization Platform
contentSnippet: Balcony will use Chainlink’s Runtime Environment (CRE) to bring over $240 billion worth of government-sourced property data onchain.

title: Western Union to Launch Stablecoin on Solana With Anchorage Digital
contentSnippet: The U.S. dollar-pegged token is expected to become available in the first half of 2026.

title: Pardon of Binance’s Zhao is ‘rocket fuel’ for BNB token ecosystem, says treasury CEO
contentSnippet: The pardon could pave the way for Binance's return to the U.S., which would be bullish for the BNB token ecosystem, BNB Network CEO said.

title: Bitcoin's Offshoot, BCH, Edges Up 1% to Challenge Downtrend
contentSnippet: Minor gains accompanied by elevated volume suggest underlying accumulation despite muted price action.

title: 55 Years of Financial Surveillance
contentSnippet: Reform needs to happen before the Bank Secrecy Act gets to celebrate its next big milestone, argues Nicholas Anthony, a policy analyst at the Cato Institute.

title: Consensys-backed Ethereum treasury firm SharpLink deploys $200 million in ETH on Linea Layer 2

title: The Daily: Trump’s Truth Social gets into prediction markets, Circle launches Arc public testnet, MetaMask goes multichain, and more

title: Western Union plans stablecoin launch on Solana for early 2026

title: Tether attests to full physical backing for its gold-based token as market value tops $2 billion
contentSnippet: Tether's XAUT value has more than doubled since August amid growing demand for tokenized real-world assets.
